Belgium: Privy Council grants necessary permits for artillery general Joseph de Ferraris to chart Mechelen and Brabant.
Chile:
The Franciscan order assumes the religious functions of the Jesuits in Chiloé.
Jesuit properties in Chile begin to be auctioned.
China: The Putuo Zongcheng Temple was completed.
India: Marathas led by Mahadaji Shinde defeat Rohilla Afghans and re-capture Delhi and parts of North India, thus reasserting their supremacy in north India.
Philippine: Moro pirates traveled all over the country and raids many fishing villages in Manila Bay, Mariveles, Parañaque, Pasay and Malate.
Russia: Plague Riot: A crowd of rioters entered Red Square, broke into the Kremlin and destroyed the Chudov Monastery. Plague Riot: The army suppressed the riot.
